themes: Disproportionate cultural reinvestment compared to economic growth
Risk of cultural decline due to underfunding
Importance of bold prioritization of arts and culture
Connection between creative ecosystem and Austin's prosperity
key_phrases: we invest a relatively very small portion of that prosperity back into the thing that got us here
it is more important than ever that we increase the size of our re-investment back into our culture
our culture will slowly dwindle away
learn from history and the mistakes of other markets
be bold about how we prioritize the future of our art, music, culture, and heritage
barriers_identified: insufficient reinvestment of economic prosperity into the creative ecosystem
solutions_proposed: increase the size of our re-investment back into our culture to be more appropriately proportionate to the enormous prosperity
